SELECT DISTINCT(ST.TAB_KEY) AS tabKey, ST.TAB_ID AS tabId, ST.TABNAME AS tabName, ST.IMG_URL AS imageUrl, ST.DISPLAY_SEQUENCE AS displaySequence
FROM SMC.SMC_TAB_MASTER ST JOIN SMC_SECURITY_FUNCTION SF ON ST.TAB_ID = SF.TAB_ID JOIN SMC_ROLE_SEC_FUNCTIONS RSF ON RSF.SEC_FUNC_ID = SF.SEC_FUNC_ID WHERE DASHBOARD_TAB = 1 AND RSF.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} AND ST.STATUS='A' ORDER BY DISPLAY_SEQUENCE ASC

SELECT HEADER_NAME AS headerName, HELP_TEXT AS helpText, HEADER_ID AS headerId
FROM SMC.SMC_ALERT_HEADER
WHERE TAB_ID = #{value}
ORDER BY DISPLAY_SEQUENCE ASC

SELECT ALERT_ID AS alertId, ALERT_KEY AS alertKey, ALERT_NAME AS alertName, ACTIONABLE AS actionable, HELP_TEXT AS helpText, TEMPLATE_ID AS templateId
FROM SMC.SMC_ALERTS
WHERE HEADER_ID = #{value}
ORDER BY DISPLAY_SEQUENCE ASC
